div: Raw data used for the quantum yield determination of CSS formation for TAA-ph 1-Ir-ph 1-AQ upon 410 nm laser excitation with 8 mJ laser pulses of about 10 ns duration. (a) UV-Vis absorption spectra of TAA-ph 1-Ir-ph 1-AQ (green, in CH 3CN) and [Ru(bpy) 3] 2+ (orange, in water), which was used as reference compound for relative actinometry. (b) Transient absorption traces upon 410 nm excitation of the deoxygenated solutions shown in (a). CSS formation was monitored at 720 nm (green), [Ru(bpy) 3] 2+ ground state bleach at 455 nm (orange). For further explanation, see the main text and Section 1.3 of the ESI. â€
